name: AttachContactToConversation
description:
Attach a contact to a conversation in Intercom.

Use this tool to add a contact as a participant to an Intercom conversation. If a contact is added via email and does not exist, a new contact with the role of 'lead' will be created. This is useful for managing participants in ongoing discussions.

parameters.name: conversation_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the conversation in Intercom.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

parameters.name: api_version
parameters.description: Specify the version of the Intercom API to use. Select from available versions such as '1.0', '2.9', etc.

parameters.name: contact_request_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'admin_id' of the admin and 'customer' details for attaching a contact.

admin_id.description: The `id` of the admin who is adding the new participant.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The identifier for the conversation as given by Intercom.

admin_id.description: The `id` of the admin who is adding the new participant.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
